text:
The parameters of the request are duplicated after a form authentication.

Put the test file attached afterwards into a protected area with a form login.

Execute the file like:

http://localhost:8080/protected/test_get.jsp?testval=CONTENT

The form authentication appears, enter a correct user and password and you'll 
get a page like this:

Value 0 for testval = CONTENT
Value 1 for testval = CONTENT

and you should get only 1 param value because you've sended only one in the URL
creator: vicentesalvador@netscape.net
vicentesalvador@netscape.net
text:
Created attachment 467
Test file that shows the bug
